This episode I show you a few really simple techniques for building door openings that integrate perfectly with my new modular cave system.

Demonstration of various Proxxon hotwire tools. 


Black Magic Craft intro music by Black Magic Craft

title: New Cave Doors For D&D Tutorial (Black Magic Craft Episode 047)
